game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the temple.
game.description: Legend says the artifact is concealed within a forgotten temple deep in the jungle. You must retrieve it to save your village from an impending curse.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the temple
task.description: Talk to the ancient shaman in the heart of the jungle for clues about the temple's location.

task.objective: Pass the trials of the temple
task.description: The temple is guarded by ancient trials; overcome them to reach the artifact.
